short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost the visibility of your website in LLM results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PromptBoost AI Analyzer helps you understand and improve your website's visibility in AI-powered search results. With intelligent analysis powered by your browsing patterns and ChatGPT interactions, get more relevant and personalized insights.

Key Features:
• Instant Analysis: Get immediate insights about your website's AI visibility
• Smart Recommendations: Receive personalized suggestions based on your browsing history
• AI Interaction Analysis: Learn from your ChatGPT conversations to improve content strategy
• Visibility Score: See your overall AI visibility score
• Top Prompts: View the most relevant AI prompts for your website
• Competitor Analysis: Check if competitors are mentioned in AI responses
• URL Visibility: Know if your URL appears in AI-generated content

Perfect for:
- Digital Marketers
- SEO Professionals
- Content Creators
- Website Owners
- Business Analysts
- AI Content Strategists

How it works:
1. Click the extension icon while on any webpage
2. Get instant analysis of your website's AI visibility
3. View detailed results including score and top prompts
4. Receive personalized recommendations based on your browsing patterns
5. Learn from your ChatGPT interactions to improve content strategy

Smart Features:
• Browsing Pattern Analysis: The extension learns from your website visits to provide more relevant recommendations
• ChatGPT Integration: Your AI conversations help inform content strategy
• Real-time Updates: Instant analysis as you browse
• Personalized Insights: Recommendations tailored to your industry and interests

Privacy & Security:
• Secure local storage
• Data encryption
• Privacy-focused design
• Transparent data collection
• No personal data sharing
• User-controlled data
